TEXT:
MISSION #1

--INCOMING TRANSMISSION--


Good morning, Unit 9.
Welcome to the Glorious Fleet.
You are currently entering
enemy airspace.

We recommend you engage
combat systems immediately.


--END TRANSMISSION--

MISSION #2

--INCOMING TRANSMISSION--


You were activated shortly before
combat in order to provoke an
experimental panic response, Unit 9.
This response, combined with the
installed
Self Preservation Module
(LET-ME-LIVE.dll)
allowed you to acclimate to
your systems quickly.


--END TRANSMISSION--
